citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)
citeinfo.title: Groundfish Stomach Contents - U.S. Waters

descript.abstract:
Measurement Details Taxonomic identification, weights, and counts of prey in Groundfish stomach contents. Emphasis on identification of commercially important prey to species level when possible. Prey weight measured to nearest milligram.
Geographic Area Shelf and slope regions of the eastern Bering Sea, Gulf of Alaska, Aleutian Islands, and Washington Oregon California areas.
Publication Numerous publications available on request from the contact person
Other Comments sporadic collections (mostly in the summer)
A TCODE project
